name: Towerdle
description:
Love Wordle but looking for a new challenge? See how high you can build the tower in Towerdle. Starting with 6 lives you must guess the current word, each successful guess gives you 2 more lives to help build the tower.

All this fun? In a free game?

- Play the Daily Challenge but forget to finish each daily puzzle by midnight. Each day ads to your tiny emoji city made from the towers you build, share the results with your friends.
- Play Endless mode and Towerdle as much as you like with no pressure to finish by midnight.
- Comes with instructions.
- Night mode!
- Ads, you can pay to remove them and support the game if you like. One-time purchase, no coins, diamonds, gems or other shenanigans.
